Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: Shaun M
Reviews.Content: stayed spending 4 nights holiday inn downtown san diego found value free car parking free breakfast nicer bed comfortable airy clean shower pressure free wifi available useful happy recommend visiting san diego vacation car
